content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Upgrade your Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon® Wildlands experience with the Gold Edition. Take down the Santa Blanca Cartel however you choose in this open world military shooter, with 4-player co-op. Includes the main game, Year 2 Pass, and Ghost War Pass.

Year 2 Pass includes: Early access to 6 new Ghost War Classes, the Splinter Cell pack, 4 Spec Op crates, and 4 Ghost War crates.

Ghost War: Team up with your friends and put your skills to the ultimate test in exhilarating 4v4 multiplayer deathmatches.

Customization: Create exactly the Ghost you want, with nearly limitless personalization options.

Massive open world: Explore the beautiful and diverse Bolivian landscape with over 60 unique vehicles for all terrains.

Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).


Online Play (Optional)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

© 2017 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Tom Clancy’s, Ghost Recon, the Soldier Icon, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are registered or unregistered trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries.
